location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Edward Russell, Collector at Masulipatam [Machilipatnam] to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that the Collector at Masulipatam [Machilipatnam] has received word from the Board of Revenue respecting Jaffer's ... pension. It notes that a committee will be held at Masulipatam to discuss the subject.
